title: This is EXACTLY why no one trusts the mainstream media!!!

embed.description: ★ A questionable review of 2017 in gaming has popped up claiming Destiny 2 and EA's Star Wars Battlefront 2 are among the best... ★ ★Enjoyed it? Give it a LIKE!!! Loved it?

body: Any gamer who has read about Destiny 2 and EA's BF2 would know that they belong on the dumpster fire list of the year lol
